title: Wrestlemania 40 Was Special
description: He finished the story and we couldn't be happier.

transcript_chunks.text: what' you think of Wrestlemania 40 incredible I mean there's no you know what I mean like I thought it was special it was incredibly special I think that's the easiest way of like it was special Roger yeah as my first WrestleMania that I've ever seen this meet my expectations which was a hard thing to do right like WrestleMania XL this is the one hey this is the one you got to watch everyone's got to watch this one and by the ending of it I was blown away uh you know for me this was great after following the WWE for a full year here right getting to know the cast know the crew uh it had everything that I ever wanted from a two night Affair for WWE wrestling I blown away man I am it lived up to every single expectation that I had and then some I don't even think there's there's a question of comparing this to other uh Manas like the level of quality is so high and I just I can't wait to see where we go with this cuz this does feel like simultaneously the end of an era and the beginning
